message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.AI

Reasoning: The paper deals with defining a new class of distances between statistical multivariate distributions by solving an optimal transportation problem. This involves concepts from information theory, machine learning, computer vision, and data science. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), followed by cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
